long_description: All-day comfort in a lightweight design, Oakley Half Jacket 2.0 polarized sunglasses combine style and clarity for all your outdoor activities. Open-edge design extends your vertical field of vision and peripheral clarity. Lightweight nylon frames are stress resistant and flexible. Shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses enhance durability. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Unique Oakley 3-point fit includes optical alignment for sharp, accurate vision, impact absorption for improved protection, and geometry designed to enhance peripheral view. Molded ear- and nose-pieces increase adhesion as you sweat, maintaining a secure fit when competition heats up. Comes with a specially woven, electrostatic bag for cleaning and storage to preserve the superior optical quality. Polished black frames feature black Iridium(R) gray-tinted lenses to provides neutral contrast-best for extremely bright lightlight. Reflective Iridium coating enhances optical clarity and contrast and reduces glare in varying light conditions.
